mapper.select: /*manageDAO getProcMon 2021.08.22 ORW*/ SELECT A.*, B.* FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) AS 'allCnt' FROM MON_PROCESS WHERE USE_TYPE=${useType}) A, (SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN USE_SUCCESS = 'Y' THEN 'Y' END) AS 'successCnt', COUNT(CASE WHEN USE_SUCCESS = 'N' THEN 'N' END) AS 'failCnt' FROM MON_PROCESS WHERE USE_TYPE=${useType}) B

/*manageDAO getProcMon 2021.08.23 ORW*/ SELECT USER_ID AS 'userId', USE_URL AS 'useUrl', USE_IP AS 'useIp', USE_TYPE AS 'useType', USE_SUCCESS AS 'useSuccess', DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS 'createDt' FROM MON_PROCESS WHERE USE_TYPE =${useType}
ORDER BY CREATE_DT DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, 10
